017package org.apache.juneau.xml;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
021
022import java.util.*;
023import java.util.concurrent.*;
024
025import org.apache.juneau.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
027
028/**
029 * Represents a simple namespace mapping between a simple name and URI.
030 *
031 * <p>
032 * In general, the simple name will be used as the XML prefix mapping unless there are conflicts or prefix re-mappings
033 * in the serializer.
034 *
035 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
036 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/XmlBasics">XML Basics</a>
037 * </ul>
038 */
039@Bean(sort=true)
040public class Namespace {
041
042   private static final ConcurrentHashMap<String,Namespace> CACHE = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
043
044   /**
045    * Create a {@link Namespace} with the specified name and URI.
046    *
047    * <p>
048    * Previously-encountered name/uri pairs return a cached copy.
049    *
050    * @param name The namespace name.  See {@link Namespace#getName()}.
051    * @param uri The namespace URI.  See {@link Namespace#getUri()}.
052    * @return The namespace object.
053    */
054   public static Namespace of(String name, String uri) {
055      String key = name + ":" + uri;
056      Namespace n = CACHE.get(key);
057      if (n == null) {
058         n = new Namespace(key, name, uri);
059         Namespace n2 = CACHE.putIfAbsent(key, n);
060         return (n2 == null ? n : n2);
061      }
062      return n;
063   }
064
065   /**
066    * Create a {@link Namespace} from a <js>"name:uri"</js> string pair.
067    *
068    * @param key The key/pair string.
069    * @return The namespace object.
070    */
071   public static Namespace of(String key) {
072      Namespace n = CACHE.get(key);
073      if (n != null)
074         return n;
075      int i = key.indexOf(':');
076      if (i == -1)
077         return of(key, null);
078      if (key.startsWith("http://") || key.startsWith("https://"))
079         return of(null, key);
080      return of(key.substring(0, i).trim(), key.substring(i+1).trim());
081   }
082
083   /**
084    * Converts the specified object into a {@link Namespace} object.
085    *
086    * <p>
087    * Can be any of following types:
088    * <ul>
089    *    <li>A {@link Namespace} object
090    *    <li>A string containing a name/value pair of the form <js>"name:uri"</js>.
091    * </ul>
092    *
093    * @param o The input.
094    * @return The namespace object, or <jk>null</jk> if the input was <jk>null</jk> or an empty JSON object.
095    */
096   public static Namespace create(Object o) {
097      if (o == null)
098         return null;
099      if (o instanceof Namespace)
100         return (Namespace)o;
101      if (o instanceof CharSequence)
102         return of(o.toString());
103      throw new BasicRuntimeException("Invalid object type passed to Namespace.create(Object):  ''{0}''", className(o));
104   }
105
106   /**
107    * Converts the specified object into an array of {@link Namespace} object.
108    *
109    * <p>
110    * Can be any of following types:
111    * <ul>
112    *    <li>A {@link Namespace} array
113    *    <li>A comma-delimited string with key/value pairs of the form <js>"name:uri"</js>.
114    *    <li>A <c>Collection</c> containing any of object that can be passed to {@link #createArray(Object)}.
115    * </ul>
116    *
117    * @param o The input.
118    * @return The namespace objects, or <jk>null</jk> if the input was <jk>null</jk> or an empty JSON object.
119    */
120   @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
121   public static Namespace[] createArray(Object o) {
122
123      if (o instanceof Namespace[])
124         return (Namespace[])o;
125
126      if (o instanceof String[]) {
127         String[] ss = (String[])o;
128         Namespace[] n = new Namespace[ss.length];
129         for (int i = 0; i < ss.length; i++)
130            n[i] = create(ss[i]);
131         return n;
132      }
133
134      if (o instanceof CharSequence) {
135         String[] ss = splita(o.toString());
136         Namespace[] n = new Namespace[ss.length];
137         for (int i = 0; i < ss.length; i++)
138            n[i] = create(ss[i]);
139         return n;
140      }
141
142      if (o instanceof Collection) {
143         Collection c = (Collection)o;
144         Namespace[] n = new Namespace[c.size()];
145         int i = 0;
146         for (Object o2 : c){
147            if (o2 instanceof Namespace)
148               n[i++] = (Namespace)o2;
149            else if (o2 instanceof CharSequence)
150               n[i++] = create(o2.toString());
151            else
152               throw new BasicRuntimeException("Invalid type passed to NamespaceFactory.createArray: ''{0}''", o);
153         }
154         return n;
155      }
156
157      throw new BasicRuntimeException("Invalid type passed to NamespaceFactory.createArray: ''{0}''", o);
158   }
159
160   final String key, name, uri;
161
162   /**
163    * Constructor.
164    *
165    * @param name The short name of this schema.
166    * @param uri The URI of this schema.
167    */
168   private Namespace(String key, String name, String uri) {
169      this.key = key;
170      this.name = name;
171      this.uri = uri;
172   }
173
174   /**
175    * Returns the namespace name.
176    *
177    * @return The namespace name.
178    */
179   public String getName() {
180      return name;
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * Returns the namespace URI.
185    *
186    * @return The namespace URI.
187    */
188   public String getUri() {
189      return uri;
190   }
191
192   @Override /* Object */
193   public String toString() {
194      return key;
195   }
196}
